metadata.title: Catalogue of Life
metadata.description: Data from the Catalogue of Life. A partial list, containing species not found in other name sources.
Data is transformed into DwCA Taxon format, for loading into the Atlas of Living Australia's name indexes.

taxonomicCoverage.generalTaxonomicCoverage: Covers Bacteria, Protozoa, Chromista, Viruses and Fungi

metadata.citation: Atlas of Living Australia & Catalogue of Life
